mapper.select: SELECT c.*,m.nickname sendusernickname ,mb.nickname writeusernickname, m.profile_img senduserprofileimg, mb.profile_img writeuserprofileimg from CHATROOM c JOIN members m on c.userno = m.userno JOIN members mb on c.writeuserno = mb.userno where (c.userno=#{userno} or c.writeuserno= #{userno}) ORDER BY sendtime DESC
SELECT room_no,count(case when not(senduserno=#{userno}) and unread_count=1 then 1 end) unreadcount FROM CHAT_MESSAGE GROUP BY room_no HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
select rownum, c.*, m.nickname, m.profile_img, m.phonenumber from chat_message c join members M on c.senduserno = m.userno where room_no = #{room_no} ORDER BY sendtime ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_MESSAGE SET unread_count=0 WHERE room_no=#{room_no} and not(senduserno=#{userno})

UPDATE chat_message SET chatcontent = #{chatcontent} WHERE ROWID IN ( SELECT rid from ( SELECT ROWID rid, rownum rn from chat_message where room_no = #{room_no} ORDER BY sendtime ASC) where rn = #{rownum});
mapper.select: SELECT nickname,profile_img FROM members where userno=#{userno}
